entityId.localType: State Library of Western Australia Call Number

nameEntry.part: Photographs relating to life at Salvation Army children's homes in Cottesloe and Subiaco

biogHist.abstract: Photographs relating to life at Salvation Army children's homes in Cottesloe and Subiaco is a collection of 40 negatives, 13 copy negatives and 2 photographic prints relating to the Salvation Army children's homes in Cottesloe (girls) and Subiaco/Nedlands (boys). The collection is held by the State Library of Western Australia.
biogHist.p: Open. According to the State Library of Western Australia, these photographs are available online, However, you need to send a request to view them.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: State Library of Western Australia - Contact Details

resourceRelation.relationEntry: 'Photographs relating to life at Salvation Army children's homes in Cottesloe and Subiaco', in Find & Connect - Western Australia,

resourceRelation.relationEntry: Salvation Army Girls at Cottesloe Beach

archref.unittitle: Salvation Army Girls at Cottesloe Beach
archref.abstract: This is a digitised copy from a collection of photocopies of images held by the State Library of Western Australia in its collection, 'Photographs relating to life at Salvation Army children's homes in Cottesloe and Subiaco [picture]'. It shows a large group of girls, with staff.
